content: shield of honor version 2 here is an alternate version of the shield of honor square i wasn t happy with my first version so i came up with this one then i thought others might like the first version so i decided to keep them both shield of honor 12 square version 2 designed by melinda hobgood i hook or size needed for gauge worsted weight yarn use two shades of the same color stitch guide fpdc - yo insert hook from front to back around post of stitch indicated yo and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice cluster stitch - *yo insert hook in stitch indicated yo and pull up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook repeat from * 2 times more yo and draw through all 4 loops on hook starting with darker color chain 5 slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 3 23 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 round 2 note - double_crochet s are done in back loops only on this round change to lighter color chain 3 3 double_crochet in next st corner made double_crochet in next st fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row double_crochet in next st 3 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row 3 times end slip_stitch in top of chain 3 round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in next st 3 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row double_crochet in next 2 sts 3 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row 3 times end slip_stitch in top of chain 3 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row double_crochet in next 3 sts 5 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts fpdc in next 3 sts on previous row 3 times end slip_stitch in top of chain 3 round 5 note - double_crochet s and sl sts are done in back loops only on this round slip_stitch in each st to corner st chain 3 4 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 4 st skip next st fpdc around first fpdc on prev row double_crochet in same st fpdc around next fpdc double_crochet in next fpdc fpdc around same st skip next st double_crochet in next 4 sts 5 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 4 sts skip next st fpdc around first fpdc on prev row double_crochet in same st fpdc around next fpdc double_crochet in next fpdc fpdc around same st 3 times skip next st double_crochet in next 4 sts covering sl sts end slip_stitch in top of chain 3 round 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next st 5 double_crochet in next st
